message.body: Oh my god. I was exhausted by 10:30 today. I just want to be home: ( And this potential job at Jeff is giving me anxiety! I need to know!
Don't worry, I'll hug you later. I promise.

Oh my god. I asked my manager again for the bazillionth time about ACLS class. She said she is scheduled on December 22nd and that we could switch. I hope this is possible and that date is right! That would be great! I could go to the Xmas party with you. And hopefully I would not have to come in on Friday in its place.
Yes! That would be great. Please find out
Nope. Too good to be true.
